• Friedman, Jeffrey H. On a Super Lawyers® List

practiceAreas: Personal Injury|MVA|Workers' Compensation|Nursing Home Abuse|Medical Malpractice
description:
Located in Cleveland, Ohio, the law firm of Friedman, Domiano & Smith Co., L.P.A., provides a full range of quality, professional legal services to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need for the injuries and losses you suffered as the result of someone else's negligence.

Regarded as among the top trial advocates in their region, the law firm's attorneys possess decades of legal experience. They promise to do all they can to increase your chance of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek for your legal challenges arising from a motor vehicle accident, an act of medical malpractice or some other preventable tragedy.

One of the law firm's founding partners, attorney Jeffrey H. Friedman, suffered a debilitating injury in a car accident when he was a teenager. Having no legal recourse at the time, he has made it his life's mission to help others in similar situations, and he and his team of partners have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff clients.

Among their most notable successes, the firm's attorneys have secured the largest settlement in Ohio for natural gas explosion injuries as well as an award of more than $2 million for the victim of an off-road vehicle accident. They have also obtained many other six- and seven-figure settlements and verdicts for their clients, and the firm has gained a reputation as one of Cleveland's premier personal injury practices.

To discuss your needs with a member of the team at Friedman, Domiano & Smith Co., L.P.A., contact the firm to take advantage of a free initial consultation. The firm also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
